short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send your invoices from ProjectBase to Tally accounting software

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ProjectBase is a software for Project Contractors. Sales and Purchase invoices created in ProjectBase can be automatically sent to Tally accounting software using this chrome extension. Click 'Start' to start the invoices transfer to Tally system and click 'Stop' to stop the transfer.
